reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Collaboration against trafficking and smuggling in Nigeria & Niger (CATS NN)(Formerly Upstream Programme)

description.narrative: The programme aims to support governments in Eritrea, Nigeria and Niger to be more effective at ensuring safe, managed and regular migration, including countering human trafficking and people smuggling in countries of origin and transit.

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility
